author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa inaugurated ‘Kalaivanar Arangam’ - an auditorium off Anna Salai that can seat about 2,400 people, through video conferencing on Sunday. The auditorium spread over 1.92 lakh sq. metre with state-of-the-art facilities has been constructed at a cost of Rs. 62.73 crore, according to an official release. The completely air-conditioned auditorium has seats for 1,100 persons in the first and second floors and about 1,300 persons in the third floor. The auditorium has escalators, lifts, rooms for officials, food plaza, guest rooms, conference halls and parking space for about 200 four-wheelers and 500 two-wheelers. The parking space in basement can accommodate 50 four-wheelers and 100 two-wheelers, the release added.
title: ‘Kalaivanar Arangam’ inaugurated
